unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. We at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) prioritize visits to IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad. This year's recruitment drive starts on 26/01/2024. We offered internships on 10/11/2023 and plan pre-placement talks on 15/12/2023 at 14:00 hrs. Looking for candidates with strong analytical skills and familiarity with the Indian market dynamics. Good luck, everyone!
